message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's important to settle this quickly because the value of the money decreases with each round.
Alice, your offer was a bit unfair. Let's split the difference from your offer -  55 for me and 45 for you. The money is losing value for both of us, so let's settle this now.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I understand you want a good deal, but the longer this goes on, the less the money will be worth, especially for me. A 50/50 split is fair and avoids further losses.
